body:
I think you want to use [`tnt.ConcatDataset`](https://github.com/pytorch/tnt/blob/master/torchnet/dataset/concatdataset.py).
We should port some functionalities from `tnt` to core pytorch, `ConcatDataset` should probably be one of them (but it depends on numpy, while pytorch doesn't, so we should probably rewrite some bits of it).
